statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_name, parameter_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE parameter_value = 'value1';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts LIMIT 3;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name = 'Contract A'
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE parameter_name = 'Parameter 1' ORDER BY contract_id DESC
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE parameter_value LIKE '%value%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT contract_name, parameter_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE parameter_name = 'Parameter 2' AND parameter_value IN ('Value 1', 'Value 2')
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE '%Contract%' ORDER BY parameter_value ASC
SELECT * FROM ContractParameters
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ContractParameters WHERE contract_id = '1234'
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ContractParameters ORDER BY parameter_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Configurations WHERE parameter_name = 'config_A'
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_setting FROM Configurations ORDER BY parameter_setting ASC
SELECT * FROM ContractParameters WHERE parameter_name = 'deadline' ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ContractParameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%date%' AND parameter_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT config_id, parameter_name, parameter_setting FROM Configurations WHERE parameter_name = 'theme' ORDER BY parameter_setting DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContractParameters cp JOIN Configurations c ON cp.parameter_name = c.parameter_name WHERE cp.parameter_value = 'active' AND c.parameter_setting = 'dark';
SELECT parameter_name, COUNT(*), SUM(LENGTH(parameter_value)) AS total_length FROM ContractParameters GROUP BY parameter_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC, total_length ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 2;
SELECT contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM contract_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'parameter1';
SELECT contract_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM contract_parameters ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id > 3 ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM contract_parameters WHERE contract_id = 2;
SELECT config_id, config_name, config_value FROM contract_configurations WHERE contract_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_abi FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM contract_parameters WHERE parameter_type = 'integer';
SELECT contract_id, variable_name, variable_value FROM contract_variables ORDER BY variable_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name = 'Token'
SELECT contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_address LIKE '0x%' ORDER BY contract_name DESC

SELECT contract_name, COUNT(*) as total_parameters FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_parameters ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_parameters.contract_id GROUP BY contract_name HAVING total_parameters > 5
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM contract_events WHERE contract_id = 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'

SELECT contract_name, variable_name, variable_value FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_variables ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_variables.contract_id ORDER BY contract_name ASC, variable_name DESC
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, creator_address FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, count(*) FROM contract_events GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT * FROM contract_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'token';
SELECT contract_id, permission_type FROM contract_permissions WHERE permission_granted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, creator_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_parameters ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_parameters.contract_id;
SELECT contract_name, event_name, event_date, event_details FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_events ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_events.contract_id ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT contract_name, permission_type, permission_granted FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_permissions ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_permissions.contract_id WHERE permission_granted = TRUE;
